info.title: CAERS Report Export OpenAPI Specification
info.description: These services enable State, Local, Tribal authorities to download air emissions data that was reported by their industry in the Combined Air Emissions Reporting System (CAERS).

get.description: Get all report information for reports that match the provided criteria.

parameters.name: reportYear
parameters.description: What reporting year to return results for.

parameters.name: modifiedStartDate
parameters.description: Earliest last modified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: modifiedEndDate
parameters.description: Latest last modified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: certifiedStartDate
parameters.description: Earliest certified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: certifiedEndDate
parameters.description: Latest certified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: agencyFacilityId
parameters.description: List of Agency Facility IDs to return results for.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: List of internal CAERS report IDs to return results for.

parameters.name: reportStatus
parameters.description: List of report statuses to return results for.

get.description: Get list of reports based on provided criteria.

parameters.name: reportYear
parameters.description: What reporting year to return results for.

parameters.name: modifiedStartDate
parameters.description: Earliest last modified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: modifiedEndDate
parameters.description: Latest last modified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: certifiedStartDate
parameters.description: Earliest certified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: certifiedEndDate
parameters.description: Latest certified date that will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: agencyFacilityId
parameters.description: List of Agency Facility IDs to return results for.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: List of internal CAERS report IDs to return results for.

parameters.name: reportStatus
parameters.description: List of report statuses to return results for.

Measure.description: Value must be in numeric format '{5}.{3]

modifiedDate.description: The date of the last change made to the Report.

certifiedDate.description: The date this Report was most recently certified.
